about_the_game:
Kotel Ne Gori is first-person action-adventure game taking place in Samozbor Universe. Vanquish your opposition with rakes!

Princess of Gigacrush was abducted and imprisoned into nine magical orbs. Only Kotel and his friends can rescue her.

Game contains:
+ Endless amount of rakes to fire on your adversaries
+ Nine game stages to complete (3 in demo version)
+ Six enemy types to chase you
+ Faithful comrade follower that illuminates up your path
+ Lots of breaking bars in half
+ Circular saws moving on the floor
+ The Princess who is waiting for You to save her

content_descriptors.notes: Game contains violence, blood and foul language. Credits song contains mention of drug abuse.

fullgame.name: Kotel Ne Gori: A Friend of Lena Boots

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64 bit
  • Processor: Athlon 200ge
  • Graphics: Vega 3
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 64 bit
  • Processor: Ryzen5 3600
  • Graphics: Radeon RX 5500
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

name: Kotel Ne Gori: A Friend of Lena Boots Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: Athlon 200ge
  • Graphics: Vega 3
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:

  • Processor: Ryzen5 3600
  • Graphics: Radeon RX 5500
  • Storage: 400 MB available space

short_description: Become Kotel and liberate beloved Princess of Gigacrush that was abducted. Accept true-hearted friends to accompany your traverse.
